Question
========

What is meant with the ANCOVA assumption *homogeneity of regression slopes*?
  
Answerlist
----------
* The variance of Y is equal for all levels of the covariate X. 
* Both variable Y and covariate X are normally distributed. 
* The mean value of Y is equal for all groups across all levels of covariate X.
* The relationship between variable Y and covariate X is equal for all groups. 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
